events.name: ReportGenerated
events.description: Triggered when a new report is successfully generated after processing data.

events.name: ReportFailed
events.description: Occurs when there is an error in report generation, allowing for a retry.

events.name: ReportScheduled
events.description: When a report is scheduled for future generation based on specific criteria.

events.name: ReportDelivered
events.description: Indicates that the generated report has been delivered to the intended recipients.

commands.name: GenerateReport
commands.description: Triggered when a new report is successfully generated after processing data.

commands.name: RetryReportGeneration
commands.description: Occurs when there is an error in report generation, allowing for a retry.

commands.name: ScheduleReportGeneration
commands.description: When a report is scheduled for future generation based on specific criteria.

commands.name: DeliverReport
commands.description: Indicates that the generated report has been delivered to the intended recipients.

integrationPoints.name: DataProcessing
integrationPoints.description: Integration with data processing systems to gather metrics and data for reports.

integrationPoints.name: NotificationService
integrationPoints.description: Integration with a notification service to alert users when reports are generated or delivered.

integrationPoints.name: UserManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integration with user management systems to manage report subscriptions and access.

integrationPoints.name: ReportingDatabase
integrationPoints.description: Integration with a dedicated reporting database for storing historical report data.
